name: crucible with lid (15ml).
description:
plain and simple little ceramic white crucible with lid. designed for science labs, these make perfect little pinch pots—these are just right for table salt and pepper, rings and jewellery or found treasures.

distinctive anchor marking on rim. 

small size (15ml) is 3 cm diameter by 3 cm high.

see separate listing for large (50ml) size.

distinctive diamond marking on rim. 

large size (50ml) is 4.5 cm diameter by 4.5 cm high.

see separate listing for small (15ml) size.
